button.name: payment_action_void
button.confirm: Are you sure you want to void the authorized transaction? This action can't be undone.

button.name: action_confirm
button.invisible: state not in ['draft','approved'] or access_approval == True

button.name: action_cancel
button.invisible: state not in ['draft', 'sent', 'sale'] or not id

button.name: action_lock
button.help: If the sale is locked, you can not modify it anymore. However, you will still be able to invoice or deliver.

button.name: action_view_planning
button.invisible: planning_hours_to_plan == 0 or state in ['draft', 'sent', 'cancel'] or locked

div.class: badge rounded-pill text-bg-secondary float-end fs-6 border-0

button.name: action_update_prices
button.help: Recompute all prices based on this pricelist
button.confirm: This will update the unit price of all products based on the new pricelist.

field.name: product_id
field.context: {'partner_id': parent.partner_id, 'quantity': product_uom_qty, 'pricelist': parent.pricelist_id, 'uom':product_uom, 'company_id': parent.company_id, 'default_lst_price': price_unit, 'default_description_sale': name}

field.name: product_template_id
field.context: { 'partner_id': parent.partner_id, 'quantity': product_uom_qty, 'pricelist': parent.pricelist_id, 'uom':product_uom, 'company_id': parent.company_id, 'default_list_price': price_unit, 'default_description_sale': name }

div.t-attf-class: oe_kanban_card oe_kanban_global_click ps-0 pe-0 {{ record.display_type.raw_value ? 'o_is_' + record.display_type.raw_value : '' }}

button.name: action_update_taxes
button.help: Recompute all taxes based on this fiscal position
button.confirm: This will update all taxes based on the currently selected fiscal position.

field.name: opportunity_id
field.context: { 'default_campaign_id': campaign_id, 'default_company_id': company_id, 'default_medium_id': medium_id, 'default_partner_id': partner_id, 'default_source_id': source_id, 'default_tag_ids': tag_ids, 'default_type': 'opportunity', }

field.name: is_match_po
field.string: Kesesuaian Nilai SO di surat jalan dengan yang di DO
